wordDataArray.str: Get a whiff of that fragrance...
How about some incense for you,
And how many would you like?
I look forward to serving you again.
I’m sorry, but it looks like you have no space
You simply don’t have the funds.
They’ll work like a charm—I promise!
Come on! Give us a break. You can’t carry
Oh. You’re looking a bit light on cash, friend.
Save up and come back later!
Berries! I’ve got your fresh-picked Berries!
What do you say? Interested in something?
Thanks for stopping by! Come again!
Give one to your Pokémon, won’t you?
Whoops! looks like you can’t carry any more of
Seems you can’t pay the bill!
I’m sorry to say it, but I can’t give my goods away.
Anything I can help you find?
Thank you for coming by! And do feel free to use
our changing room whenever you’d like to.
Are you looking for anything in particular?
Congratulations! Now you can purchase more
Is there anything else I can do for you?
Are you in the market for a TM?
right? How many would you like?
I’m sorry, but it looks like you can’t carry any
And how might I help you?
You don’t have enough BP for that.
You’ve been doing some Link Battles, eh?
Have some fun with Ranked Battles, too!
I’ll even give you a special uniform for ’em!
Love to cook? You’ve come to the right place!
I’ve got all the finest ingredients right here!
Cook up something tasty, won’t you?
Oh? Looks like you’re full up and can’t carry
You don’t seem to have enough money! Save up
Which Sticker would you like to get?
Which TMs do you want to get?
Which slate do you want to get?
Which goods do you want to get?
Which goods do you want to give to me?
